ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Everybodys favorite wolf (I m kidding) hears the call for a retreat,he s both disappointed and happy at the call. He d survived his first battle in this form

Everybodys favorite wolf (I'm kidding) hears the call for a 
retreat,he's both disappointed and happy at the call. He'd survived 
his first battle in this form and gotten away with minor injuries 
compared to many of the others. It bothered him though that he only 
got to scrap one Predicon, and to do that he still needed Shadow 
Wings help. Maybe the Predicons on this planet won't be easy to 
defeat after all. One of his prey did this damage. A rams not 
supposed to hurt a wolf. 

"They're retreating?" maybe his arrival was on timeto do more than 
pick up the pieces.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Inferno731@a... wrote:
> The last dagger goes through Ares leg and he can't get up.
> 
> Shuko: Yes Zeus that would be a good idea. Predacons RETREAT!!!
> 
> Unitron, Hades, Anubis and Koga Shuko retreat back to the newcomer 
base.
> 
> Sixshot transforms to car mode and picks up Ares and heads back to 
the 
> newcomer base.
> (btw Yanshosh Inferno is at the pred base why are  you talking to 
him so 
> much???)
